weapon_staff.name: Staff
weapon_staff.description: A basic staff made from longwood found in the king's forest. Normally just used for spear training, but better than your fists in a pinch.

armor_pjs.name: Forel's Pajamas
armor_pjs.description: A set of pajamas the queen dowager sewed for you. They're warm and comfy, although you're getting a bit big for them. You hope you can get a pair without cutesy bear heads everywhere.

armor_leather.name: Leather Armor
armor_leather.description: The leather armor you were assigned when you were training with the guard. It's a bit small, but frustratingly, it's ONLY 'a bit small'.

acc_harem_robe.name: Ronpa tue Phitemos
acc_harem_robe.description: The Robe of the Loved's Home in Salin. Given to you when you confessed your true feelings to your Sydan. Your most prized possession.

acc_burqa.name: Kuvunjwa-zuri Designer Burqa
acc_burqa.description: It means 'torn-up' or 'broken style' in Edinick. You never really understood fashion trends, but this one especially doesn't make sense. Isn't a burqa supposed to be holy or something to the Alteni? That's why Sewian law requires them to wear one under penalty of death?

health_pot.name: Health Potion
health_pot.description: A crimson elixir that restores 50 HP when consumed. Brewed from healing herbs found in the northern valleys.

mana_pot.name: Mana Potion
mana_pot.description: A shimmering blue liquid that restores 30 MP. Contains concentrated magical essence.

str_elixir.name: Strength Elixir
str_elixir.description: A rare golden potion that permanently increases strength by 1. Made from the essence of mountain giants.

antidote.name: Antidote
antidote.description: A clear remedy that neutralizes most common poisons. Essential for any adventurer.

iron_sword.name: Iron Sword
iron_sword.description: A sturdy iron blade forged by skilled smiths. Well-balanced and reliable in combat.

steel_axe.name: Steel Axe
steel_axe.description: A heavy two-handed axe made from reinforced steel. Devastating in the hands of a strong warrior.

mystic_staff.name: Mystic Staff
mystic_staff.description: An ancient staff carved from silverwood and topped with a glowing crystal. Channels magical energy with ease.

leather_armor.name: Leather Armor
leather_armor.description: Basic protection crafted from tanned hide. Flexible and lightweight, perfect for starting adventurers.

chain_mail.name: Chain Mail
chain_mail.description: Flexible metal protection made from interlocking iron rings. Offers excellent defense while maintaining mobility.

plate_armor.name: Plate Armor
plate_armor.description: Maximum protection forged from the finest steel plates. Heavy but nearly impenetrable to most attacks.

steel_helmet.name: Steel Helmet
steel_helmet.description: A solid steel helm that protects the head from crushing blows. Features a reinforced crown and cheek guards.

battle_helm.name: Battle Helm
battle_helm.description: An intimidating piece of headgear worn by veteran warriors. The skull motif strikes fear into enemies.

magic_boots.name: Magic Boots
magic_boots.description: Enchanted footwear that increases movement speed and provides minor protection. Woven with wind magic.

iron_boots.name: Iron Boots
iron_boots.description: Heavy iron-plated boots that provide excellent protection for the feet and shins. Built to last through any terrain.

key_burnt_book.name: Burnt Book Cover
key_burnt_book.description: The leather cover to a textbook of Promenti prayers meant for novices that you found at the Kesvelt morgue.

key_real_fire_book.name: A First Year Disciple's Text to Spreading Miracles of Prometus
key_real_fire_book.description: A tome of Promenti prayers meant for novices. Funny how that summation was shorter than the title.

key_fake_fire_book.name: Disciple Text to Spreading Miracles of Prometus
key_fake_fire_book.description: A tome of Promenti prayers meant for novices. You got it cheap from Bubba Renald in the book store's side alley.
